text:
e="preserve">Martin "Marty" Bregman (May 18, 1926 – June 16, 2018) was an American movie producer. He was born in New York City. Bregman produced many movies including "Scarface", "Sea of Love", "Venom", "Serpico", "Dog Day Afternoon", "The Four Seasons", "Betsy's Wedding", "Carlito's Way", ', "The Bone Collector" and "The Adventures of Pluto Nash".
Bregman died of a cerebral hemorrhage in New York City on June 16, 2018 at the age of 92.
